group_1.textLeft: I see... You're bothered by the fact that you had to@suppress the Parents' Association's intervention,
with a wish.

group_1.textRight: If they hadn't made such a wild accusation,
it would've been all settled by Yuna-san's power!
Hikaru knows that.@She was keeping a sure eye on everything!

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru...

group_1.textRight: Really, you didn't even need a wish!

group_1.textLeft: Still, in the end, it's no different than if I had@overpowered them with force.
I did the exact same thing as Juri...
That's not true.
It's for the sake of everyone in the school that you@became the Student Council President, right?
As for what you did with Juri...
While you're indeed acting upon my request, was@that really the sole reason you took action there?

group_1.textRight: I also didn't want the Magical Girls of Futatsugi@to feel cornered...

group_1.textLeft: To be able to act for someone else's sake isn't easy.
That's what's so wonderful about you.
So you are not in the wrong, Yuna.
Well, what you said is quite true.
I don't think Juri is convinced of her defeat in a@real sense.
I imagine you've encountered similar problems@at your school, haven't you?
That's why, you know, it's what comes afterwards@that's important.
Using force to resolve problems peacefully...
I won't consider that a mistake.
But now that you've done so, you need to take@responsibility for it to the end.

group_1.textRight: (The Parents' Association who twisted us over@with force,
and Juri Ooba who brought others to their knees@with force...
The weight and tensions that exist now@will one day grow irrevocably large...)

group_1.narration: In fact, it is already happening.
My wish did change the election system by@warping the minds of the Parents' Association.
But the friction between the Parents' Association@and the Student Council itself has not been resolved.
So, every time there is a situation,@the Parents' Association tries to interfere@with the Student Council.

group_1.textRight: (And so the tension will linger, and be foisted@on to my juniors at the school,
and the Magical Girls of Futatsugi City...)

group_1.textLeft: Yuna.
Are you ready to take responsibility to the end@for the sake of everyone?
Then there is one thing I'd like to ask of you.
